Headline: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland Temporary Southbound Reroute near Narragansett/Between George-Diversey
ShortDescription: SB #86 buses are rerouted via Narragansett, Belmont, Austin, Diversey & Narragansett: due to, street blockage near Narragansett/Between George-Diversey.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Narragansett, Belmont, Austin, Diversey and Narragansett: due to, street blockage near Narragansett/Between George-Diversey.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following earlier police activity at Roosevelt. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following earlier police activity at Roosevelt.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
